inter-links.description: List of configure internal communication interface information. Including the source names and internal communication interface.

src-name.description: Name of an internal communication interface.

freq-trace-topos.description: List of statistics of information about the frequency syncing topology in the cluster. Including the chassis ID, frequency locking status, syncing source name, syncing source status, and pull-in status.

freq-trace-topo.description: Statistics of information about the frequency syncing topology in the cluster.

chassis-id.description: Chassis ID of the frequency syncing topology.

trace-state.description: Sync status of the frequency topology.

pullin-state.description: Pull-in status of the frequency syncing topology.

trace-source.description: Syncing source name of the frequency topology.

lock-state.description: Frequency locking status of the cluster chassis.

time-trace-topos.description: List of statistics of cluster time syncing topology information. Including the chassis ID, time locking status, and PTP device clock IDs.

time-trace-topo.description: Statistics of cluster time syncing topology information.

chassis-id.description: Chassis ID of time syncing topology.

trace-source.description: Source name of the time syncing topology.

lock-state.description: Time locking status of time syncing topology.

ptp-clock-id.description: PTP device clock ID of cluster time syncing topology.

freq-link-ports.description: List of statistics of internal communication interface used to perform frequency synchronization between chassis in the cluster.

freq-link-port.description: Statistics of internal communication interface used to perform frequency synchronization between chassis in the cluster.

src-name.description: Clock source name of the cluster chassis.

state.description: Clock source status of the cluster chassis.

peer-src-name.description: Name of the peer interface in the cluster chassis.

time-link-ports.description: List of statistics of internal communication interface of the time syncing topology.

time-link-port.description: Statistics of internal communication interface of the time syncing topology.

src-name.description: Source name of the time syncing topology.

state.description: Source status of the time syncing topology.

peer-src-name.description: Adjacent interface name of the time syncing topology.
